record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - July 17, 2007)

[Page: S9529]

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON SMALL BUSINESS AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate in order to conduct a hearing entitled "Increasing Government Accountability and Ensuring Fairness in Small Business Contracting," on Wednesday, July 18, 2007, beginning at 2 p.m. in room 428A of the Russell Senate Office Building.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Special Committee on Aging be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Wednesday, July 18, 2007 from 10:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m. in Dirksen 628 for the purpose of conducting a hearing.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
